description: Ecoplanet Soluciones Integrales is a pioneering waste management company focused on maximizing the potential of organic waste. Established in 2017, the initiative began with organic farming and evolved into an environmental agro-park. The company transforms organic waste into high-quality fertilizers and animal feed, promoting sustainability and reducing landfill waste. With numerous awards for environmental sustainability, Ecoplanet aims to create a circular economy while ensuring food security and environmental protection.
name: Ecoplanet Soluciones Integrales
